001package org.biopax.validator.api;
002
003import java.util.Collection;
004
005import org.biopax.validator.api.beans.ErrorType;
006import org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Validation;
007
008import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
009import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
010
011/**
012 * A validation rule.
013 *
014 * @author rodche
015 *
016 * @param <T> a type the rule can validate, though it also depends
017 *           on {@link #canCheck(Object)} method implementation
018 */
019public abstract class BaseRule<T> implements Rule<T> {
020
021  protected Log logger;
022
023  protected ValidatorUtils utils;
024
025  public BaseRule() {
026    logger = LogFactory.getLog(this.getClass());
027  }
028
029  /**
030   * {@inheritDoc}
031   *
032   * Implementation of the interface method.
033   *
034   * @throws NullPointerException when validation is null
035   */
036  public void error(final Validation validation, Object object, String code, boolean setFixed, Object... args) {
037
038    if(object == null) {
039      logger.warn("The 'thing' (the error is about) is NULL! Skipping.");
040      return;
041    }
042
043    // get object's ID
044    String thingId = validation.identify(object);
045
046    // properly resolve extra message args to IDs
047    // w/o changing the no. args
048    args = parseArgs(validation, args);
049
050    // create and add/update the error case using current validation profile
051    ErrorType error = (utils != null)
052      ? utils.createError(thingId, code, getClass().getName(), validation.getProfile(), setFixed, args)
053      // when - no config. available (JUnit tests?); it will be 'ERROR' type with default messages:
054      : ValidatorUtils.error(thingId, code, getClass().getName(), setFixed, args);
055
056    validation.addError(error);
057    logger.info( ((setFixed) ? "FIXED " : "") + " " + code + " in " + thingId);
058  }
059
060
061  private String[] parseArgs(Validation v, Object... args) {
062    String[] newArgs = new String[args.length];
063
064    int i=0;
065    for(Object a: args) {
066      final StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
067
068      if(a instanceof Collection) {
069        for(Object o : (Collection)a) {
070          sb.append(v.identify(o)).append("; ");
071        }
072      } else if(a instanceof Object[]) {
073        for(Object o : (Object[])a) {
074          sb.append(v.identify(o)).append("; ");
075        }
076      } else {
077        sb.append(v.identify(a));
078      }
079
080      String s = sb.toString();
081      if (s.contains("{") || s.contains("}")) {
082        s.replaceAll("\\}", ")");
083        s.replaceAll("\\{", "(");
084      }
085      newArgs[i] = s;
086      i++;
087    }
088
089    return newArgs;
090  }
091
092}
